## Question 10
**Functions: section 4.2.1, exercises 3**

```{r}
bisection <- function(eq, a, b){
 repeat{
 eq1 <- f(a)
 eq2 <- f(b)
 m <- (a+b)/2
 eq3 <- f(m)
 
 if(abs(a-b) < 0.000001){
 print((a+b)/2)
 break
 }
 
 else{
 if(eq3*eq1 > 0){
 a <- m
 }else{
 b <- m
 }
 }
 
 if(eq3 == 0){
 print(m)
 break
 }
 }
 }
```
